sentences: Third review of the financial mechanism: Tina Guthrie (Canada) reported on the outcomes of the contact group where delegates resolved the outstanding issue on the fourth review of the financial mechanism. SBI adopted conclusions and a draft COP decision ( FCCC/SBI/2006/L.32 & Add.1).

The G-77/CHINA stressed the need for the financial mechanism to be fully responsive to developing countries ` needs, while the EU and AUSTRALIA highlighted the value of looking at all sources of funding for the Convention's implementation.
